pageProduct.name: Oil Garden 3in1 Ultrasonic Diffuser
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

The 3-IN-1 Ultrasonic Diffuser is a humidifier, air-purifier and night light all in one. Using ultrasonic technology, the 3-IN-1 diffuser allows you to experience Oil Garden Essential Oils in their purest form without heat, chemicals or toxins.

Warnings

Responsible use of Essential Oils. Keep out of reach of Children. Use only as directed

Common Uses

Humidifier, air-purifier and night light all in one.

Directions

1. Place diffuser on flat surface and insert power cord into wall socket. 2. Remove the cover from the base. 3. Fill water tank to the maximum water level line (200ml) with cool tap water. Do not fill water beyond the max level mark in the water tank. 4. Add 6-9 drops in total of your favourite Oil Garden pure essential oil. 5. Replace cover and secure lightly. 6. Press the Mist button to turn on your diffuser. 7. Press the LED button to turn on light for ambience. Total Run Time ~ 3 hours
